item.title: Docker Compose vs. Kubernetes vs. Traditional Hosting: What's the Best Way to Host Your Application?
item.description: Battle of the Containerization Tools: Kubernetes vs Docker Compose vs VM Hosting Docker: The Lightweight, Portable Option for Hosting Applications Docker: Leightweight, proof-of-concept, running multiple programs on one server

item.title: Top 6 best Cloud Storage services – Free, Paid and for Businesses
item.description: Why should I store my data in the cloud? The computing industry has moved gradually away from local storage to remote, server-based storage and computing since the rise of the internet — what has been known as the cloud.
